p: SV: Precisely because of the initiatives launched by the Civil Society and Indigenous Peoples’ Mechanism (CSM)2 for the relations with the Committee on World Food Security (CFS), Indigenous Peoples’ organizations, small-scale food producers’ organizations, consumers organizations and other organizations of those most affected by hunger, malnutrition and ecological destruction of Latin America and the Caribbean took up this call. They were deeply concerned with the food problems experienced in the Latin American region.
